SELECT * FROM institution WHERE 1=1
AND name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND business_register_no LIKE '%' || #{businessRegisterNo} || '%'
AND company_type = #{companyType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mem_no, username, password, name, email, birth, gender, tel, addr, affil_type, affil_dept, position, status, created_at, institution_no) VALUES (seq_member.NEXTVAL, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{affilType}, #{affilDept}, #{position}, '활성', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{institutionNo})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_no as "memNo", m.rsrch_no as "rsrchNo", m.name, m.username, m.password, r.role_name as "roleName", r.role_no as "roleNo" FROM member m LEFT JOIN mem_role mr ON m.mem_no = mr.mem_no LEFT JOIN role r ON mr.role_no = r.role_no WHERE m.username = #{username}
